column3:
人も近づかん この台地では
わしの唯一の楽しみは料理だ
そして今日 ついに究極の料理が完成した！
名付けて ピリ辛山海焼き だ
column4:
On this desolate plateau, the only
pleasure that brings me comfort
is cooking.
And today, I outdid myself! Truly,
I created the perfect dish. I call it...
spicy meat and seafood fry.

column3:
この料理の凄いところは体力回復はもちろん
寒い雪山でもポカポカで動き回れるという事だ
これさえあれば
あの窮屈な防寒着など もういらん
column4:
This recipe not only restores health,
but it also keeps me warm, even when
traveling in the snowy mountains.
With this dish on my side, I no longer
have need of that itchy warm doublet.

column3:
だが何とした事か
肝心のレシピを書き留めるのを忘れてしまった
ケモノ肉と ポカポカ草の実を使ったのは
覚えているのだが
他に何を使ったのか どうしても思い出せない
わしも歳を取ったものだ
column4:
I do not know how I allowed this to
happen, but it seems I forgot to
write down a very important recipe.
I know it contained raw meat and
spicy pepper. However...

I simply cannot remember what else
I used! My age is catching up to me.

column3:
人も近づかん この台地では
誰かの知恵を あてにすることもできないが
もし その食材を教えてくれる者が現れたら
礼に わしの防寒着を進呈してやろう
むなしい願いだとは思うが…
column4:
Sadly, on this lonely plateau, I have only
my own knowledge and memory to
rely on. Still...
If I did find someone who knew the
missing ingredient, I would happily
reward them with my warm doublet.
However, it seems unlikely that such a
miraculous wish will ever be fulfilled.

column3:
驚いた事に わしの考案した究極の料理
ピリ辛山海焼きを再現する者が現れた
わしの防寒着を与えるに ふさわしい
なかなか見どころのあるヤツだ
column4:
To my surprise and delight, I did happen
upon someone who was able to re-create
my spicy meat and seafood fry.
I gave him my warm doublet, and I was
happy to do so. He is a fine young man
with great potential, that one.

column3:
今度こそ忘れないよう
レシピを書き留めておこう
ケモノ肉と ポカポカ草の実
そして ハイラルバスを鍋で豪快に焼くのだ
column4:
Ah, and I will now write down this
perfect recipe so that I will never
forget it.
Place some raw meat, spicy pepper,
and hyrule bass in a pot, and then
turn up the heat. Voilà!

column3:
この料理を食えば寒い雪山でも動き回れるが
効能に時間制限があることを忘れておった
防寒着なら ずっと寒さを凌ぐこともできたが
少し惜しいことをした
column4:
Eating this dish allows you to walk the
snowy mountains with ease, though I did
forget there's a time limit on the effect.
It is too bad I already gave away that
warm doublet, which keeps you warm
no matter how long you wear it.

column3:
リンクよ

薄々気づいておったかも知れぬが
わしの素性を隠していて すまなかった
回生の眠りから目覚めた お主に事を伝えるには
他に方法が思いつかなかったのだ
column4:
Link...


Bit by bit, you may come to realize who
I am. I am sorry for not revealing my
true identity to you sooner.
The truth is, after you awoke from your
long Slumber of Restoration, I did not
know how to tell you all there was to say.

column3:
わしの演技も なかなかじゃったろう？

冗談は さておき…

厄災ガノンを倒し
わが娘 ゼルダを助けてやってくれないか
簡単ではないことは わかっておる
だが お主にはできる
そう わしは確信しておる
100年前と変わらぬ いい眼をしておったぞ
column4:
Perhaps deceiving you was not the right
thing to do. Still...you must admit I put
on a great performance!
But all joking aside...what I ask of you
is of the utmost importance, dear hero.

I implore you, with all my heart...
defeat Calamity Ganon and save
my precious daughter, Zelda.
I understand this is no simple task I am
asking of you, but I know beyond a
shadow of a doubt that you can do it.
I do not doubt it for a moment. I see
courage in your eyes, just as I did
100 years ago. I believe in you, Link.

column3:
わしの演技も なかなかじゃったろう？

冗談は さておき…

厄災ガノンを倒し
わが娘 ゼルダを助けてやってくれないか
簡単ではないことは わかっておる
だが お主にはできる
そう わしは確信しておる
100年前と変わらぬ いい眼をしておったぞ
column4:
Perhaps deceiving you was not the right
thing to do. Still...you must admit I put
on a great performance!
But all joking aside...what I ask of you
is of the utmost importance, dear hero.

I implore you, with all my heart...
defeat Calamity Ganon and save
my precious daughter, Zelda.
I understand this is no simple task I am
asking of you, but I know beyond a
shadow of a doubt that you can do it.
I do not doubt it for a moment. I see
courage in your eyes, just as I did
100 years ago. I believe in you, Link.

column3:
そうそう防寒着を ここに置いておこう
これから先 きっと お主の役に立つだろう
料理や暖を取って寒さをしのぐのもいいが
無茶は いかん
では頼んだぞ
column4:
Ah, yes, one more thing. I have left the
warm doublet here as a gift of sorts.
I'm sure it will be useful on your journey.
You can also weather the cold with
cooking alone, but I caution against it.
There is no time for recklessness.
We are all counting on you.
